channel.title: Multiple connections
channel.description:
Hey guys. what the problem is that,, when my servers on.. the cmd command prompt says lots of connections that are dissconecting. I feel unsafe. lol. But its like this. a connection that didnt even log in just nulled or disconnected... Like lots of connections! from diffrent ips! atleast 10 ips at the same time. like 1 ip null.. 2 min later the same ip null.. Help me guys. Thanks.
But i wanna know how to remove those connections from my list? help guys please! Thanks.

item.title: Multiple connections
item.dc:creator: @mager_pk mager pk
item.description:
@mager_pk wrote:

[quote=“nimoo, post:2, topic:311905”]This happens to almost everyone, i suppose u have downloaded ur source, and most of these base’s got null bugs, and they r pretty hard to prefix, so thats nothing special to worry about…
if you want to be 100% safe, just run a virus test and be sure that nobody is in ur computer connecting to your server

GL.[/quote]

Thanks man!!! help is appricatted!! :D!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2009, 09:12:32 am[/size][hr][quote=“mager pk”][quote author=nimoo link=topic=408349.msg3014440#msg3014440 date=1257087711]
This happens to almost everyone, i suppose u have downloaded ur source, and most of these base’s got null bugs, and they r pretty hard to prefix, so thats nothing special to worry about…
if you want to be 100% safe, just run a virus test and be sure that nobody is in ur computer connecting to your server

GL.
[/quote]

Thanks man!!! help is appricatted!! :D!![/quote]

But i want to get rid of it how do i do that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2009, 10:32:08 am[/size][hr]anyone?!

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple connections
item.dc:creator: @nimoo nimoo
item.description:
@nimoo wrote:

This happens to almost everyone, i suppose u have downloaded ur source, and most of these base’s got null bugs, and they r pretty hard to prefix, so thats nothing special to worry about…
if you want to be 100% safe, just run a virus test and be sure that nobody is in ur computer connecting to your server

GL.
